snippet: After another gain, the Dow Jones industrial average ended the day up 9.4 percent for the year so far.
abstract: Stocks rise slightly, pushing Dow Jones industrial average to third consecutive nominal high after Labor Department reports evidence of hiring increase.
lead_paragraph: After another gain, the Dow Jones industrial average ended the day up 9.4 percent for the year so far.

headline.main: Dow Hits 3rd New High, Helped by Jobless Report
headline.print_headline:
Dow Hits 3rd New High,
Helped by Jobless Report
